problem_names:
lemma AnalBinds_cong:
  assumes "ae f|` domA \<Gamma> = ae' f|` domA \<Gamma>"
  shows "AnalBinds \<Gamma>\<cdot>ae = AnalBinds \<Gamma>\<cdot>ae'"
lemma AnalBinds_lookup: "(AnalBinds \<Gamma>\<cdot>ae) x = (case map_of \<Gamma> x of Some e \<Rightarrow> fup\<cdot>(exp e)\<cdot>(ae x) | None \<Rightarrow> \<bottom>)"
lemma AnalBinds_delete_bot: "ae x = \<bottom> \<Longrightarrow> AnalBinds (delete x \<Gamma>)\<cdot>ae = AnalBinds \<Gamma>\<cdot>ae"
translations:
proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. AnalBinds ((x, e) # \<Gamma>)\<cdot>ae = (AnalBinds \<Gamma>\<cdot>ae)
    (x := fup\<cdot>(exp e)\<cdot>(ae x))

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. x \<notin> domA \<Gamma> \<Longrightarrow>
    (AnalBinds \<Gamma>\<cdot>ae) x = \<bottom>

lemma AnalBinds_cong:
  assumes "ae f|` domA \<Gamma> = ae' f|` domA \<Gamma>"
  shows "AnalBinds \<Gamma>\<cdot>ae = AnalBinds \<Gamma>\<cdot>ae'"

proof (prove)
using this:
  ?x \<in> domA \<Gamma> \<Longrightarrow> ae ?x = ae' ?x

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. AnalBinds \<Gamma>\<cdot>ae = AnalBinds \<Gamma>\<cdot>ae'
lemma AnalBinds_lookup: "(AnalBinds \<Gamma>\<cdot>ae) x = (case map_of \<Gamma> x of Some e \<Rightarrow> fup\<cdot>(exp e)\<cdot>(ae x) | None \<Rightarrow> \<bottom>)"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (AnalBinds \<Gamma>\<cdot>ae) x =
    (case map_of \<Gamma> x of None \<Rightarrow> \<bottom>
     | Some e \<Rightarrow> fup\<cdot>(exp e)\<cdot>(ae x))
lemma AnalBinds_delete_bot: "ae x = \<bottom> \<Longrightarrow> AnalBinds (delete x \<Gamma>)\<cdot>ae = AnalBinds \<Gamma>\<cdot>ae"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. ae x = \<bottom> \<Longrightarrow>
    AnalBinds (delete x \<Gamma>)\<cdot>ae = AnalBinds \<Gamma>\<cdot>ae
by (auto simp add: AnalBinds_lookup split:option.split simp add: delete_conv)

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. AnalBinds (delete x \<Gamma>)\<cdot>ae \<sqsubseteq>
    AnalBinds \<Gamma>\<cdot>ae
by (auto intro: fun_belowI simp add: AnalBinds_lookup split:option.split)

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. edom (AnalBinds \<Gamma>\<cdot>ae)
    \<subseteq> domA \<Gamma> \<inter> edom ae
by (induction \<Gamma> rule: AnalBinds.induct) (auto  simp add: edom_def)
